resources.string: AccidentHelper was designed to detect car accidents using the internal sensors of your smartphone. App sends an emergency notification to your predetermined emergency numbers and to web server.

Application utilizes such a sensor as: Accelerometer and GPS. Additionally, it measures sound intensity level in decibels. All this measurement informations are processed in accident detection algorithm, which decides if accident occurred or not.
When algorithm detects accident alarm screen appears and you have 20 seconds to cancel alarm if you don\'t do that the notification will be send.
The notification includes all measured data in time when accident take place. This information can be helpful to determine localization of event.
If you want to enable SMS notification (disabled by default) you should go to Settings and there enter emergency numbers.
Beyond the main function of this app, you can check actual measuring values, to do that, click sensor details button.
